body.p: This topic contains information about possible known issues and other things that you might want to be aware of in regards to .

section.title: Reviewers see Variable Key References Expanded as an Unexpected Value
section.p: Since the Oxygen Web Author editor that the Reviewers use to proofread and make changes to uploaded files is a lightweight version of Oxygen XML Editor/Author, it does not have all of the features that the Content Author has access to. For example, in Oxygen XML Editor/Author, the Content Author can select which value they want to see expanded for defined variable key references. In the Oxygen Web Author editor, the Reviewers will see their first value that is detected.
